comments.creator: wcosta@mozilla.com
comments.text: Currently, `ci-admin` allows adding an `additional-user-data` per worker configuration. For baremetal machines, we need to add a field `tmpfsSize` user data per instance type.
comments.raw_text: Currently, `ci-admin` allows adding an `additional-user-data` per worker configuration. For baremetal machines, we need to add a field `tmpfsSize` user data per instance type.
comments.author: wcosta@mozilla.com
wcosta@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text:
This patch allows the configuration of custom user data per instance
type.
comments.text:
Created attachment 9144694
Bug 1634387: Support additional-user-data per instance type r=tomprince


This patch allows the configuration of custom user data per instance
type.
